mapper.insert: insert into sc_estate (id, name, coverd_area, property_id, property_fee, comment, community_id, create_time, creator_id, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverdArea,jdbcType=REAL}, #{propertyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propertyFee,jdbcType=REAL}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sc_estate set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coverd_area = #{coverdArea,jdbcType=REAL}, property_id = #{propertyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, property_fee = #{propertyFee,jdbcType=REAL}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, coverd_area, property_id, property_fee, comment, community_id, create_time, creator_id, modify_time from sc_estate where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, coverd_area, property_id, property_fee, comment, community_id, create_time, creator_id, modify_time from sc_estate
